assertions.title: convey the accessible name of the select
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know the purpose of the select.

assertions.title: convey the select role
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the element has select behavior.

assertions.title: convey changes to the value after making a selection
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the value was successfully changed.

assertions.title: convey the current value of the select
assertions.rationale: The user needs to know that the current value is when they navigate to the control.
